articles.author: Pete Volk
articles.title: F1 Manager 22 review: The perfect game for Formula 1 obsessives - Polygon
articles.description: Frontier Developments’ newest management sim capitalizes on the explosion in Formula 1 racing’s fan base, making the complex sport approachable on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox.
articles.content: In October 2000, EA Sports published F1 Manager, a racing simulator in which players took on the management of a real Formula One team. 22 years later, it finally has a follow-up. And its fantastic.… [+6104 chars]
